name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior System Engineer with 8 years of expertise in systems management and IT operations within high-performance environments. Proficient in **Linux**, **Apache**, **MySQL**, and **FTP**, with strong skills in **SMTP**, **DNS**, and **Squid** for integrated systems solutions. Familiar with monitoring tools like **CheckMK** and **Nagios**, underpinned by ITIL practices to ensure seamless service delivery and support. Strong problem-solving abilities combined with solid documentation skills in both English and German enhance operational efficiency.

In addition to core systems engineering, I bring advanced full-stack development capabilities, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Well-versed in frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with significant cloud experience in **Azure** and **AWS**. I also possess a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, enabling the creation of robust, compliant applications tailored for sectors like healthcare and finance. My background includes developing enterprise-grade platforms with AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing.
